title: Yatri Sathi
description:
Available in Kolkata, Siliguri, Durgapur & Asansol

Welcome to Yatri Sathi, the official cab, bike or bus booking app by the Government of West Bengal. Book your ride hassle-free and experience convenient transportation in Kolkata. With Yatri Sathi, you can easily find registered and verified drivers, enjoy transparent pricing, and experience secure rides.

Booking bike, cabs & bus has never been this easy & hassle-free!

Feature highlights

🚕 Quick & Easy Booking: Install → Sign Up → Book → Pay → Repeat. Book a ride that arrives right at your doorstep—simple as that.
🏍️ Fast, Easy & Safe Rides: Find a bike or cab in just a few taps. Enjoy a smooth, stress-free commute with total safety.
🚌 Live Bus Tracking + Instant Booking: Track your bus in real time and book your seat in seconds—no guessing, no waiting.
📍 Save Favorite Locations: No more typing your address every time. Just pick from your saved spots and go!
🔁 Repeat Rides, Effortlessly: Commuting daily? Tap “Repeat Ride” and auto-fill your pickup & drop—zero hassle, every day.
🧭 Real-Time Navigation & Tracking: Track your cab, bike or bus live on the map. Know exactly when it’s arriving and where you're headed—with top-notch navigation tech.
💸 Affordable, Transparent Pricing: No haggling, no hidden fees. Just fair fares and full visibility with our detailed rate card.
💵 Direct Payments: Pay your driver instantly via cash or UPI—easy and flexible.
🧾 100% Transparent Rides: Check fare breakdowns, rate your ride, and share feedback—because you deserve clarity and control.
🌐 Available in Local Languages: Use Yatri Sathi in Bengali, Hindi or English — your language, your way.
🎟️ Book Attraction Tickets On the Go: Grab tickets to Nicco Park and more—right from the app. Fast. Easy. Totally hassle-free.

How to book a bike or cab through Yatri Sathi app

✅ Download Yatri Sathi ride booking app
✅ Signup on the app with your phone number
✅ Pick your drop location and then confirm your pickup location
✅ Let us assign the nearest driver
✅ Start your ride
✅ Pay the driver directly through cash or UPI, at the end of the trip

How to track bus and book tickets through Yatri Sathi app
✅ Download Yatri Sathi app and login with your phone number
✅ Tap on the Track Bus icon on the home screen
✅ View nearby buses on the bus landing page
✅ Search buses by route or stop name
✅ Check bus fare, ETA, and route details
✅ Book your ticket directly through the app 

Follow us on our social media platforms and stay updated:

Instagram: https://instagram.com/yatri.sathi
Twitter: https://x.com/yatri_sathi
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YatriSathiKol
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/yatri.sathi.wb

Get to know more about us at https://yatrisathi.in/

developer.devId: Dept of IT&E, Govt of WB

developerLegalAddress: 6Th Floor, Module C And D, Block Ep And Gp, Moni Bhandar, Street Number 19, Webel Bhavan, Salt Lake Sector-V, Bidhan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700091, India
